p.s: The movie The Hate U Give, directed by George Tillmann Jr. released in 2018, is based on a book with the same title, written by Angie Thomas.
It deals with the life of a 16 year old girl, named Starr, after her friend Khalil was shot by a racist police officer and how racism affects her life.
The given scene shows Starr in her white school.
She is at her locker when she sees her boyfriend.
She is mad at him because he wanted to take their relationship on a further level without asking.
They talk about the situation and Starr ends up forgiving him.
The scene ends with them walking to a less public place, smiling at eachothereach other.
